title: Not getting icon for xayah and rakan
body: I played xayax and Rakan (I probably spelled their name's wrong sorry about that) and my friend got the icon and I didn't

replies.body:
Hey! 

These should have been handed out at this point. If you don't have it, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and Player Support would be able to take a look at your account and see why you don't have the icon. If you should have the icon, they should be able to grant it to you!

first, its xayah.
second: double check, i had this problem, it was just hidden in my icons
